directions: Cut the tops of each pepper leaving the stems intact. Use a paring knife to cut away the seeds and ribs inside each pepper. Set aside.
Heat the coconut oil in a pan and cook the garlic and onion until softened
Add the mince and cook for 5 minutes
Mix in the grated cauliflower, cinnamon, all spice, salt and pepper.
Mix in diced tomatoes, parsley and mint. Cook for a further 5 minutes allowing flavours to intensify.
Spoon mixture into the peppers and arange onto a large baking dish.
Cook in the oven for a further 45 minutes, until the peppers are softened and slightly browned.
title: Cinnamon and parsley lamb stuffed peppers
